query: SELECT t.id, t.code, t.title, COUNT(q.id) as question_count FROM certification_tests t LEFT JOIN test_questions q ON t.id = q.testId GROUP BY t.id, t.code, t.title
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3VC7xi4RHX81jG7.65112bc774d1 --database K34VNBtbDJyjtW8qhrCBdB --execute SELECT t.id, t.code, t.title, COUNT(q.id) as question_count FROM certification_tests t LEFT JOIN test_questions q ON t.id = q.testId GROUP BY t.id, t.code, t.title
